q.name: Blooming Burst
q.description: Neeko throws a seed dealing magic damage. The seed blooms again on hitting champions or killing units.

w.name: Shapesplitter
w.description: Neeko passively deals bonus magic damage every third attack. Neeko can activate to send a clone in a direction.

e.name: Tangle-Barbs
e.description: Neeko slings a tangle that damage and root everything it passes through. If the tangle kills an enemy or passes through a champion, it becomes larger, faster, and roots for longer.

r.name: Pop Blossom
r.description: After a short preparation, Neeko leaps into the air and gains a shield. Upon landing, nearby enemies are damaged and stunned. The preparation is hidden if Neeko is disguised.

i1.name: Inherent Glamour
i1.blurb: Neeko can look like an ally champion. Champion combat or casting damaging spells breaks the disguise.
i1.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Neeko''' is offered a selection of {{tip|champion|allied champions}} to take their appearance. Once selected, there's a {{fd|2.5}} seconds delay before another champion can be selected.
i1.description2: While disguised, '''Neeko''' can use basic attacks against non-champions while keeping her form. Starting a basic attack against enemy champions, or taking damage from them, or casting either {{ai|Blooming Burst|Neeko}} or {{ai|Tangle-Barbs|Neeko}} breaks the illusion and puts ''Inherent Glamour'' on cooldown.
notes: * '''Neeko''' will copy aesthetics as well as superficial mechanical [[Champion statistic|Statistics]]. She will fake a number of readings:
** [[Health|Health bar]] (original's current amount becomes her apparent maximum)
** [[Manaless|Secondary resource]] - e.g. {{as|mana}}, {{as|energy}} or none at all (original's current amount becomes her apparent maximum)
** [[Buff|Buffs]] and [[Debuff|debuffs]] with their respective icons and VFX
*A number of attributes she actually adopts are:
** Character interactions (Jokes, taunts, dances, laughs, toggle effects), as well as their [[Recall]]
** Attack range (will not adopt longer [[Range|attack range]])

riot.name: Blooming Burst
riot.description: Neeko throws a seed dealing magic damage. The seed blooms again on hitting champions or killing units.
riot.tooltip: Neeko throws a seed that blooms to deal {{ explosiondamage }} magic damage. If it kills a unit or hits a champion or large monster, it will bloom again, dealing {{ seconddamage }} magic damage. Max 2 extra blooms.

q1.name: Blooming Burst
q1.blurb: Neeko throws a seed dealing magic damage. The seed blooms again on hitting champions or killing units.
q1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Neeko''' propels a seed into a target area dealing {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}} to enemies within.
q1.description2: If the seed kills an enemy unit or damages a champion or large monster, it will bloom again after a short delay to deal {{as|magic damage}}. This cannot happen more than twice per ''Blooming Burst''.
q1.leveling2: {{st|Second and Third Bloom Damage|{{ap|35 to 115}} {{as|(+ 20% AP)}}|Total Maximum Damage|{{ap|70+35*2 to 250+115*2}} {{as|(+ 90% AP)}}}}

riot.name: Shapesplitter
riot.description: Neeko passively deals bonus magic damage every third attack. Neeko can activate to send a clone in a direction.
riot.tooltip:
Passive: Every 3rd attack deals {{ passivebonusdamagecalc }} bonus magic damage and increases Neeko's movement speed by {{ passivehaste }}% for {{ passivehasteduration }} second.

Active: Neeko becomes invisible for {{ stealthduration }} seconds and projects a clone that lasts {{ cloneduration }} seconds. Neeko and the clone gain {{ haste }}% movement speed for {{ hasteduration }} seconds.

w1.name: Shapesplitter
w1.description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Neeko''' resonates with spiritual energy every third basic attack, dealing {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} and granting her {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for 1 second.
w1.leveling:
{{st|Bonus Magic Damage|{{ap|50 to 130}} {{as|(+ 60% AP)}}}}
{{st|Bonus Movement Speed|{{as|{{ap|20 to 40}}%|ms}}}}
w1.description2: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Neeko''' becomes {{tip|invisibility|invisible}} for {{fd|0.5}} seconds, sending a temporary [[Champion_summoned_units#Decoys|clone]] of her {{ai|Inherent Glamour|Neeko|current form}} sprinting in the target direction for 3 seconds and up to 900 units away.
w1.description3: Both '''Neeko''' and the clone gain {{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}} for 3 seconds.
notes: * The passive part of ''Shapesplitter'' can affect turrets.
* The clone travels in the target direction until it runs into terrain.
* Extra bolts from {{ii|Runaan's Hurricane}} charge the passive part of ''Shapesplitter''.

riot.name: Tangle-Barbs
riot.description: Neeko slings a tangle that damage and root everything it passes through. If the tangle kills an enemy or passes through a champion, it becomes larger, faster, and roots for longer.
riot.tooltip:
Neeko slings a tangle that deals {{ basedamage }} magic damage and roots for {{ minrootduration }} seconds.

The tangle becomes empowered after hitting an enemy, growing larger, moving faster, and rooting for {{ maxrootduration }} seconds.

e1.name: Tangle-Barbs
e1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Neeko''' slings a magical spiral in a target direction, dealing {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|root|rooting}} enemies it passes through.
e1.description2: If ''Tangle-Barbs'' hits at least one enemy, it grows in size and speed, and the root duration is increased.

riot.name: Pop Blossom
riot.description: After a short preparation, Neeko leaps into the air and gains a shield. Upon landing, nearby enemies are damaged and stunned. The preparation is hidden if Neeko is disguised.
riot.tooltip:
After {{ delayuntilreveal }} seconds Neeko leaps into the air. She gains a shield that absorbs {{ baseshield }} damage (+{{ shieldmultiplier }} for each nearby enemy champion).

When Neeko lands she deals {{ totaldamage }} magic damage and stuns nearby enemies for {{ ccduration }} seconds.

This ability can be prepared in secret if Neeko is disguised.

r1.name: Pop Blossom
r1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Neeko''' {{ct|channel|winds up|cast=true|attack=true|move=true|items=true|spells=true,true,true,true|silence=false}} over {{fd|1.25}} seconds, creating a zone around her. The zone is invisible to enemies while she is {{ai|Inherent Glamour|Neeko|disguised}}.
r1.description2: '''Neeko''' then {{tip|shields}} herself for 2 seconds, increased for each enemy champion nearby, as she leaps into the air for {{fd|0.6}} seconds.
r1.leveling2: {{st|Shield|{{ap|50 to 110 3}} {{as|(+ 50% AP)}}|Bonus Shield Per Champion|{{ap|40 to 80 3}} {{as|(+ 40% AP)}}|Maximum Shield|{{ap|50+40*5 to 110+80*5 3}} {{as|(+ 250% AP)}}}}
r1.description3: Upon landing, '''Neeko''' bursts with spiritual energy, dealing {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|stun|stunning}} nearby enemies for {{fd|1.25}} seconds.
notes: * {{tip|Stasis}} will not cancel ''Pop Blossom'' and can be activated during the wind up but not during the leap.
